title: Meiji Logo
content:
Anybody know the typeface of the Meiji chocolate brand - I’m having no luck in my search?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/meiji_4238.jpg)

 [‹ Help with a fat face?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41107 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serenity UK Poster Font ID requested ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41108 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gemma

comments.content:
Hi Gemma,  
most likely custom, i.e. lettered. Someone please correct me if I’m wong.  
Alternatives? [Fenice Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/itc_fenice_std_ultra_oblique/?sample_text=Meiji&sample_size=96&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) has an [Oblique](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Oblique) too – see the ‘i’. Then again, it has no [ball terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/ball%252Bterminal) wih the ‘j’. And no swashes.  
You might like [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203202542/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001003#specimen).  
F
